content.rendered:
Directed by Ritesh Batra.

Written by Ritesh Batra.

Cast Nawazuddin Siddiqui(Rafi). Sanya Malhotra(Miloni). Sachin Khedekar(Kanti Bhai). Denzil Smith(Hasmukh Bhai). Brinda Trivedi(Saloni). Lubna Salim(Sheilaben). Rajesh Kumar Sharma(Fazlu Master). Shihaan Bakshi(Mohan). Akash Sinha(Banke). Seema Pravin Shende(Teller). Robin Das(Gafoor (as Robin Kumar Das)). Bhagwan Das Patel(Kulfiwallah). Ashok Pathak(Gopal Taxi Driver). Amarjeet Singh(Bilal). Saharsh Kumar Shukla(Zakir Bhai). Shreedhar Dubey(Raghu (as Shree Dhar Dubey)). Geetanjali Kulkarni(Rampyaari). Akash Dhar(Himesh). Jim Sarbh(Anmol Sir). Akriti Singh(Lata). Farrukh Jaffar(Dadi). Purnanand Wandekar(Taxi Driver 1). Kenneth Desai(Jawanti Bhai). Ramesh Deo(Dr. Kher). Taruna Singh(Ruksana). Paras Vicky Waghela(Sonu). Soham Yogesh Nayurkar(Monu). Sanjay Sonu(Taxi Driver 2 (as Sanjay Kumar)). Manyuu Doshi(Chintan (as Deepal Doshi)). Veerendra Saxena(Soda Distributor (A Friendly Appearance) (as Virendra Saxena)). Dharmendra Gupta(Taxi Driver 3). Vijay Raaz(Tiwari’s Ghost (A Special Appearance)). Sam R. Kerawalla(Mr. Sodabottlewallah) . Abdul Quadir Amin(Amjad (uncredited)). Harshit Dang(Abhay (uncredited)). Emeara Kamble(Myra (uncredited)). Sunil Shakya(Sandwich wala (uncredited))

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Ritesh Batra. Martina Valentina Baumgartner. Viola FÃ¼gen. Smriti Jain. Neil Kopp. Michel Merkt. Gaurav Mishra. Sanjeev Mishra. Arun Rangachari. Vivek Rangachari. Jeff Rowles. Vincent Savino. Anish Savjani. Cécile Tollu-Polonowski. Michael Weber.

Production Poetic License Productions. Film Science. Pola Pandora Film productions.
